_header: Hail hermit most that is of might
Subjects: Robert of Bury, saint; prayers, to saints

BLEge3143.First Lines:
Hayle heremete mast þat ys of myghtffray way to were the
                    wafull wyght…
BLEge3143.Last Lines:
…And euer to belde wyth hym in blysseI beseke the grauntte me
                    this. Amen
BLEge3143.Editions:
Haslewood,  Joseph,
                        ed.  
             The Metrical Life of Saint Robert of Knaresborough.
         London: A. J. Valpy, 1824: v-vii.
Bazire,  Joyce,
                        ed.  
             The Metrical Life of St. Robert of Knaresborough, together with the
